profileText: a Representative from Michigan; born in Toledo, Lucas County, Ohio, November 4, 1948; graduated from Whitmer High School, Toledo, Ohio, 1966; attended University of Toledo, Toledo, Ohio; United States Marine Corps; auto worker; union representative; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Thaddeus George McCotter (November 6, 2012-January 3, 2013); was not a candidate for election to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress in 2012; died on September 23, 2024.
